title: '70s type roundup by Gene Gable at creativepro.com
content:
I was a lad in those halcyon days, and remember some of the examples rather fondly.

[http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/25801.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106084937/http:/www.creativepro.com/story/feature/25801.html "http://www.creativepro.com/story/feature/25801.html")
author: marcox

comments.content: What a fine collection. I have a feeling there will be a lot of linking to that page from the ID board.
Wow, looking at those images in Gene Gable's article is like stepping into a time machine.
Thanks, James. Title of the thread has been corrected.
